title: Let's go sailing. No. 1
creator_credit: Town and Country Productions and Bill Latto
brief_description: Two people learn the elements of dinghy sailing and seamanship with expert instructors at a sailing school. The first lessons are given in Albacore, a National Firefly and a National Enterprise. When the rudiments have been learned they progress to an Ocean Racer.
creator_credit_for_label: Town and Country Productions and Bill Latto
